about_the_game:
Another comic book in Hatred universe.
It's called Black Label and tells a story of...you will see.
It's in black&white style just like our game which makes it even darker.
Damian Smith has made it!
From the projects in Harlem to the beautiful neighborhood of Redfield in upstate New York.
....Having the wealth but not respect Damian begins his path towards infamy.

content_descriptors.notes:
This comic book contains:
- Frequent Violence and Gore, both displayed and implied.
- Visual depictions of Nudity and Sexual acts.
- Implied Sexual acts.
- Offensive language.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel® Core™ i5-750 or 3.2 GHz AMD Phenom™ II X4 955
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R7 260x with 2 GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 11 compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel®Core i7-3770 or AMD FX-9590 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480 with 3GB VRAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 11 compatible soundcard
